Package it.sauronsoftware.base64

Base64 encoders and decoders.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Base64 Base64 encoding and decoding utility methods, both for binary and textual informations.
Base64InputStream A base64 encoding input stream.
Base64OutputStream A base64 decoding output stream.
 

Package it.sauronsoftware.base64 Description

Base64 encoders and decoders.
